messages.title: JAKE IN THE GREEN
messages.content: A mini festival at The Beacon to celebrate our wonderful town of Hastings and all things green.

mentions.candidate: Jake Bowers, Green Party candidate for Hastings and Rye, fresh from the campaign trail

issues.environment: Celebrate our wonderful town of Hastings and all things green.

images.caption: JAKE IN THE GREEN a mini festival at The Beacon.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Live music from King Size Slim, Brigitte Aphrodite, The Rosy Hoydens. Craftivism for all ages: Make yourself a 'Green Graffiti-tee' with Becky McCray and the Crafternoon Tea Club. Bring your own T-shirt or choose one from our collection to customise with Green slogans in time for Jack in the Green. Fundraising auction of work donated by local artists.
